indlearners_body_text:
Since July 2020, Robotics for All has provided online courses for students from K- 8th grade.

* Classes run for 8 weeks. All classes are taught in English.
* Classes include one or two live sessions over Zoom and optional homework
* Each class will have a maximum student-instructor ratio of roughly 5:1
* Lead instructors and Teachers Assistants are high school students and above
* All volunteers over the age of 18 must pass a detailed background check run
* ***Every***Â volunteer is carefully screened through a comprehensive written application and interview before being accepted.

schools_body_text:
Since July 2020, Robotics for All has provided online courses for students from K- 8th grade.

* Classes run for 8 weeks. All classes are taught in English.
* Classes include one or two live sessions over Zoom and optional homework.
* Partners may select one of our suggested courses or may run any course that is on our course syllabi (suggested courses below and syllabi below).
* Partner organizations may teach our curriculum by receiving training from our curriculum team and or have Robotics for All teachers teach the classes.
* All of our curriculum for partnered organizations can be taught in-person. Contact us for more information
* Please contact us for more details on training, logistics, and acquiring kits.
